text: Tobias Anselm (born 24 February 2000) is an Austrian football player. He plays as Midfielder for the Austrian Bundesliga club WSG Tirol. ==Career == Anselm began his career at SV Kirchbichl. In 2011 he moved to FC Kufstein. In 2013 he joined the FC Red Bull Salzburg academy. In September 2017 he made his debut for the farm team FC Liefering in the second division He came in in the 80th minute on matchday 12 of the 2017/18 season against FC Blau-Weiß Linz. He also played 7 matches for FC Red Bull Salzburg in the UEFA Youth League and scored 2 goals. Weltfußball.de Players profile After three seasons in which he made 44 second division appearances and 9 goals he then moved to Bundesliga club LASK for the 2020/21 season. He was loaned directly to WSG Tirol. WSG Tirol Homepage After two years at WSG he returned to LASK for the 2022/23 season. He missed the entire season due to injury. In the 2023/24 season he only played for the LASK Amateure OÖ until the winter break. In January 2024 he was then loaned to third division club FC Viktoria Köln in Germany. Viktoria Köln Homepage During the loan he made ten appearances in the 3rd division, in which he scored twice. For the 2024-25 season he moved permanently to WSG Tirol. title: Tobias Anselm
